overview: The boys are scared. They let someone steal their sheep, without saying a word to him. The girl is not very well. She sleeps all day long, but she wakes up for a little bit during the night. They want her to get better. So they wake up in the middle of the night just to feed her. Maybe at some point she will get better. Maybe at some point she will wake up on her own.
title: Lefkamos
